title: Uroš Stojanov
text:
Uroš Stojanov (; born 5 January 1989 in <a href="Kikinda">Kikinda</a>, <a href="Socialist%20Federal%20Republic%20of%20Yugoslavia">SFR Yugoslavia</a>) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who plays for <a href="%C3%8DF%20Fuglafj%C3%B8r%C3%B0ur">ÍF Fuglafjørður</a>.
He played for different Serbian and Bosnian football clubs. As in June 2015 Stojanov is one among the new <a href="Zorya%20Luhansk">Zorya Luhansk</a> candidate players...
